overview: Director Sh. Dorjsuren explained that DOZ Entertainment's film 'Ticket to Life' was created to show the reality to citizens at a time when drug use is growing rapidly in Mongolia. The film is based on real-life research based on research conducted by the Ministry of Justice, the Metropolitan Police Department, the Ministry of Health, and the National Center on Drug Abuse. It is intended for adults, over the age of 16, as it deals with drug-related issues. The name of the film was inspired by a poem written by poet Galsansukh for money.
title: Амьдрах тасалбар МУСК
